1525973983_1Jz58PYy4dgxNX4QuPsnDpPQgF5UN.body: Webtorrent has a nasty seeding bug, something to do with Electron. Won't allow you to seed more than 20 or so films.

> [usersdoctor](#comment_3_1Jz58PYy4dgxNX4QuPsnDpPQgF5UNvcEVx): Once i had 10 tabs with the whole season of westworld and it worked great. It must cost some money for service like webtor.io to seed and download everything each time you open/close new torrent file to stream, how they do it ?

I know, but therein lies the problem. It's very uncomfortable to use compared to, say.. using Bittorrent.
 
The vast majority of today's internet services are funded by either ads, donations .. or, in rare cases, javascript cryptocurrency miners. People who want free movies generally want things to be free ... no ads, no donations, no coinhive. So it must stay 100% free or people will rebel.
